column2: [Root.GetFirstName] is lowborn from no distinguished dynasty. You may grant [Root.GetFirstName] the priviledge to form [Root.GetHerHis] own house with [Root.GetHerHis] own Coat of Arms.
Your Official Royal Mistress. She keeps your bed warm when your wife will not perform her duties. Her position also comes with a bit of power
